paper_abstract: In this paper, we study the performance of Saitou and Nei's neighbor-joining method for phylogenetic reconstruction. We show that the edge l(infinity) radius of the method is (1)/(4). This improves an result by Atteson [The performance of neighbor-joining methods of phylogenetic reconstruction, Algorithmica 25 (1999) 251-278] and Xu et al. [A lower bound on the edge l infinity radius of Saitou and Nei's method for phylogenetic reconstruction, Inform. Process. Lett. 94(5) (2005) 225-230]. Previously, only an upper bound 1 and a lower bound 1 were known. (c) 2006 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: On the edge l(infinity) radius of Saitou and Nei's method for phylogenetic reconstruction
